summary: This document contains an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing their whereabouts and plans for the upcoming weekend. Staley mentions being in Nantucket and racing in the Opera Cup, while Epstein indicates he will be in Southampton. The email also includes a confidentiality notice regarding the communication.

keyFacts: Jes Staley mentions being in Nantucket and racing in the Opera Cup.
Jeffrey Epstein plans to go to Leon's in Southampton next weekend.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is intended only for the use of the addressee and unauthorized use is prohibited.
